span.span: home of the beautiful Ocoee, Conasauga, and Hiwassee Rivers and the Cherokee National Forest!
We are located in the southeastern corner of Tennessee in the heart of the Tennessee Overhill area.
Thank you for visiting the official website of the Polk County Department of Education.Â
We are very proud of our students, our schools, and our communities. Our district consists of 3 elementary schools, 1 middle school, Â 2 high schools, and a virtual learning academy for grades K-10.

p.span: Click the icon to log in to ourÂ district applications

div.p: If you want to be notified of updates to our website, please subscribe here!

li.p: Schools Closed for the remainder of the year
See the latest update from Dr. Jones here.

p.span: Click on this link for the latest news and resources during the district closure. If you have not been contacted by your school, please call the school office as soon as possible.
